text: Kasone az şumo, ki hamsaroni xeşro [az lihozi hurmati hamʙistarī hamcun] modari xud talaqqī mekunand, [ʙidonand, ki] on zanon hargiz modaronaşon naxohand ʙud; modaroni eşon faqat zanone hastand, ki onhoro ʙa dunjo ovardaand. Onon suxane nopisand va nohaq megūjand va [agar tavʙa kunand] Alloh taolo ʙaxşojandai omurzgor ast
